CustomField.formula: IF(TEXT(How_Many_Refund_Options__c) = "1", 0, IF(TEXT(How_Many_Refund_Options__c) = "2", 1, IF(TEXT(How_Many_Refund_Options__c) = "3", 2, IF(TEXT(How_Many_Refund_Options__c) = "4", 3, IF(TEXT(How_Many_Refund_Options__c) = "5", 4, IF(TEXT(How_Many_Refund_Options__c) = "More than 5", 5, 0))))))
CustomField.label: How Many Refund OptionsR
